overview: Who said exercise has to be like work?  This is a workout for people who want to have fun!  Paula Abdul brings you the best of her own unique style in this dance-packed cardio workout, followed by lower body toning and adancer's stretch.  Count on it, you'll break a sweat, AND, you'll get in shape.
tagline: Who said exercise has to be like work?
title: Paula Abdul Cardio Dance
